### Mattermost

You can join our public mattermost channel [here](https://lmmisld-lmu-stats-slds.srv.mwn.de/mlr_invite/).

### Stack Overflow

Questions regarding the software can be asked on [Stackoverflow](https://stackoverflow.com), where
you can use the `mlr3` tag.

### GitHub

For bug reports, suggestions, or feature requests, please raise an issue in the corresponding
[GitHub repository](https://github.com/mlr-org). Before you do that, please read through our
[issue guide](https://mlr-org.com/development.html/issue-guide), doing so makes our life easier and your issue will be solved quicker.
